name: Rage Against The Machine
description:
Short game for the three hour jam #trijam188, not really polished!

- WASD and mouse to move around and look around,

- Find the evil machine - located somewhere along the outer walls - before time runs out (2 minutes). Place the bomb by just going close to it!

- When the bomb is placed You got to find Your way back to where You started in 30 seconds, to use the ladder to get out. To climb the ladder You have to go close to it - might be a bit fiddly, but escape ladders usually are :)

- The walls are turning every 5 seconds so beware!

- Maze is randomized every run

Music made by me, but not within the jam!

Things I wanted to have:

* Guide to find the bomb/exit

* Enemies

* Nicer maze with more stuff, pick-ups and so on
